Messages.Content:
Create a per-game “HeadlessBootstrap” scene

Empty scene: no cameras, no lights, no URP volumes, no debug spawners.

Only include what sim needs to exist at boot (SubScene refs if your sim requires them).

Name/path is stable so build scripts can hard-reference it.

Verify all presentation init hooks are hard-gated

Anything like SRP setup / camera rigs / render catalogs must early-return when headless. You already have a good pattern in EnsureSrpEarly (if (RuntimeMode.IsHeadless) return;) 

EnsureSrpEarly

.

Coplay’s job is to smoke-test: opening HeadlessBootstrap in Editor should not auto-spawn presentation objects.

Keep Windows presentation scenes untouched

Presentation work continues in normal scenes; headless build never needs to include them.

Arguments.task_progress:
- [ ] Analyze `EnsureSrpEarly` and `RuntimeMode` implementation
- [ ] Create `HeadlessBootstrap` scene
- [ ] Configure `HeadlessBootstrap` scene (add necessary simulation components)
- [ ] Verify presentation hooks are gated
- [ ] Smoke test: Open `HeadlessBootstrap` and verify hierarchy
